Judul: ANALISIS POTENSI LIKUIFAKSI PADA LOKASI RENCANA TATA RUANG KAWASAN STRATEGIS NASIONAL CEKUNGAN BANDUNG DI KABUPATEN BANDUNG, JAWA BARAT
Abstrak: The study area that is located at coordinates 107o 37Ã‚Â’ 50,00Ã‚Â” Ã‚Â– 107o 45Ã‚Â’ 50,00Ã‚Â” longitude and 6o 57Ã‚Â’ 50,00Ã‚Â” Ã‚Â– 7o 0Ã‚Â’ 50,00Ã‚Â” latitude is a region in the Bandung Basin covered by thick unconsolidated quartenary sediments mostly in saturated condition. These aforementioned conditions can trigger liquefaction so that the review about liquefaction potential in this area is necessary. Liquefaction occurs by trigerring condition that makes sediments loose its effective stress and replaced by pore water pressure. Liquefaction potential analysis in this study is done by using SPT data at study area, including susceptibility rating and its initiating factors. Various methods of liquefaction analysis are used to determine safety factor of liquefaction (FSL) based on sediment characteristics. Based on conducted liquefaction analysis, research area has three sediment types, they are alluvial fan sand sediment, lake clay sediment and floodplain sand-clay sediment. Ratio of CRR (Cyclic Resistance Ratio) to CSR (Cyclic Stress Ratio) of earthquake with Mw = 7.2 and Mw = 7.5 shows that research area has liquefaction risk because it has less than one SF (Safety Factor) value. Meanwhile, for the case of earthquake with Mw = 6.6 shows that research area has no liquefaction risk.
Kontributor / Dosen Pembimbing: Pembimbing : Dr. Eng. Imam A. Sadisun, S.T., M.T.
Kata Kunci: Bandung Basin, Quartenary deposit, liquefaction, earthquake, safety factor
